page.title: 16SCHOOL GAMES IN SKERRIES
page.content: At school we play games like{rounders, {squash, football}and{teks.}This is how you play teks. You have everybody in a place called The{Hole}except for the{catchie.}To start off with the oldest person in the Hole hits a ball as far as he or she can. The catchie runs for the{ball while the other people are running around the school. When the catchie gets the ball he or she runs after the others and tries to hit them with the ball. The others have to try to get to the Hole because they can't be caught in the Hole. Anyone that is caught joins the catchie and the game goes on until the people are all caught. We play till it is time to go in to school.
